to.shell_command:
# Get the ID of the currently focused window
    current_window_id=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --windows --window | /opt/homebrew/bin/jq -r '.id')

    # Close the currently focused window
    /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --close "$current_window_id"

    # Get the list of windows
    windows=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --windows)

    # Find the next window to focus on
    next_window_id=$(echo "$windows" | /opt/homebrew/bin/jq -r --arg current_window_id "$current_window_id" '
      .[] | select(.id != ($current_window_id | tonumber) and
                  (.["is-visible"] // false) == true and
                  (.["is-minimized"] // false) == false) | .id' | head -n 1)

    # Focus on the next window
    if [ -n "$next_window_id" ]; then
      /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --focus "$next_window_id"
    else
      echo "No next window to focus on."
    fi

    # Press Escape Key
    osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to key code 53'

# Get the ID of the currently focused window
    current_window_id=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --windows --window | /opt/homebrew/bin/jq -r '.id')

    # Minimize the currently focused window
    /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --minimize

    # Get the list of windows
    windows=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --windows)

    # Find the next window to focus on
    next_window_id=$(echo "$windows" | /opt/homebrew/bin/jq -r --arg current_window_id "$current_window_id" '
      .[] | select(.id != ($current_window_id | tonumber) and
                  (.["is-visible"] // false) == true and
                  (.["is-minimized"] // false) == false) | .id' | head -n 1)

    # Focus on the next window
    if [ -n "$next_window_id" ]; then
      /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --focus "$next_window_id"
    else
      echo "No next window to focus on."
    fi
